The fact that the crack may or may not be a virus isn't the only problem with this, the expansion pack
clearly states in the installer. "EUROPEAN ONLY"
about which Postal 2 you need & in the game, you'll
notice at the bottom left corner on the menu it's the
U.S version. This will probably keep the expansion
from working anyway, so I say, just delete the AW
part, enjoy the full, working game of Postal 2 - Share the Pain and if you want the expansion so bad, buy it off Amazon or some other trusted site.
